title: Start
body:
Hi, is this the first time you're playing this game?
[[ answer: yes|tutorial]] 
[[ answer: no|havefun]]

title: Node_2
body: To open your inventory press I and to switch items between your inventory and hotbar click them [[Answer:Node_3|Node_3]]

title: Node_3
body: Finally, to attack press the left mouse button

title: tutorial
body: To move around use the WASD keys [[Answer:Node|Node]]
